text: Tini tomadera jan'ya bidhibad'dha karechena dina, yara nirdesa diyechilena nuhake, ara ya amara ohi karechi apanake ebam yara nirdesa diyechilama ibarahima, musa o â€˜isake, e bale ye, tomara dinake pratisthita kara ebam tate bibheda srsti kara na [1]. Apani musarikaderake yara prati dakachena ta tadera kache kathina mane haya. Allah yake icche tara dinera prati akrsta karena ebam ye tamra abhimukhi haya take tini dinera dike hedayata karena
